languages.text: {n}Псайкер вся сжимается. Ее раздирает между ужасом от последствий предлагаемого вами решения и беспрекословной преданностью вам. Но вы-то знаете — она никогда не посмеет перечить.{/n}
{n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Псайкер вся сжимается. Ее раздирает между ужасом от последствий предлагаемого вами решения и беспрекословной преданностью вам. Но вы-то знаете — она никогда не посмеет перечить.{/n}

languages.text: {n}她畏缩着，犹豫着，不知道是该违抗你的命令，还是该面对这么做的后果。但你很清楚，她永远不敢违抗你的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她畏缩着，犹豫着，不知道是该违抗你的命令，还是该面对这么做的后果。但你很清楚，她永远不敢违抗你的命令。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Se encoge. Su miedo a las consecuencias de la solución que has propuesto y su lealtad absoluta hacia ti se enfrentan en una dura batalla, pero sabes que nunca se atrevería a desafiarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se encoge. Su miedo a las consecuencias de la solución que has propuesto y su lealtad absoluta hacia ti se enfrentan en una dura batalla, pero sabes que nunca se atrevería a desafiarte.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie schrumpft zusammen. Sie ist hin- und hergerissen zwischen der Angst vor den Konsequenzen deines Lösungsvorschlags und ihrer absoluten Loyalität dir gegenüber. Doch du weißt, dass sie es niemals wagen würde, sich dir zu widersetzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie schrumpft zusammen. Sie ist hin- und hergerissen zwischen der Angst vor den Konsequenzen deines Lösungsvorschlags und ihrer absoluten Loyalität dir gegenüber. Doch du weißt, dass sie es niemals wagen würde, sich dir zu widersetzen.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女は尻込みをしている。あなたの提案した解決策がもたらす結果への恐怖と、あなたへの絶対的な忠誠心の間で揺れ動いているようだ。しかし彼女に逆らう勇気がないことを、あなたは知っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は尻込みをしている。あなたの提案した解決策がもたらす結果への恐怖と、あなたへの絶対的な忠誠心の間で揺れ動いているようだ。しかし彼女に逆らう勇気がないことを、あなたは知っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle se recroqueville, déchirée entre la peur des conséquences de la solution que vous lui proposez et sa loyauté absolue à votre égard. Mais vous savez qu'elle n'osera jamais vous défier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle se recroqueville, déchirée entre la peur des conséquences de la solution que vous lui proposez et sa loyauté absolue à votre égard. Mais vous savez qu'elle n'osera jamais vous défier.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira siniyor. Teklif ettiğin çözümün sonuçlarından duyduğu korku ile sana olan sadakati arasında kalıyor. Kaldı ki asla sana karşı gelmeye cüret etmeyeceğini biliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She shrinks. She is torn between her fear of the consequences of your proposed solution and her absolute loyalty to you. But you know that she would never dare to defy you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sinip kalıyor. Teklif ettiğin çözümün sonuçlarına dair duyduğu korku ve sana duyduğu sadakatin arasında kalıyor. Fakat sana asla karşı gelmeye cüret etmeyeceğini biliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
